import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Loader from 'react-loaders' import AnimatedLetters from '../AnimatedLetters' import LogoTitle from '../../assets/images/logo-s.png' import Logo from './Logo' import './index.scss' const Home = () => { const [letterClass, setLetterClass] = useState('text-animate') const nameArray = ['e', 'e', 'p', 'a', 'k'] const jobArray = [ 'D', 'a', 't', 'a', ' ', 'S', 'c', 'i', 'e', 'n', 't', 'i', 's', 't', '.', ] useEffect(() => { return setTimeout(() => { setLetterClass('text-animate-hover') }, 4000) }, []) return ( <>

H i,
I 'm

Data Scientist / Machine Learning Expert / Developer

CONTACT ME
) } export default Home
